/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
/** Meet the U.S. Comptroller General block. */
.meet-comptroller-general { width: 100vw; position: relative; left: calc(-1 * (100vw - 100%) / 2); background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/meet-comptroller-general-background-mobile.png") no-repeat center; background-size: 100% 100%; padding: 2.5rem; }

.meet-comptroller-general header, .meet-comptroller-general .description { color: #FFFFFF; }

.meet-comptroller-general header { margin-top: 0; }

.meet-comptroller-general .description { max-width: 100%; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button { font-family: 'Lato'; font-weight: 400; border-radius: 2rem; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 3rem; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); background-color: #0071BC; border-color: #0071BC; color: #FFFFFF; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button:active, .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button .active, .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button .is-active { border-radius: 2rem; }

@media screen and (max-width: 576px) { .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button { letter-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); }
  .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button:not(.subscribe):not(.clear-filters) { width: 100%; } }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button:hover { background-color: #205493; border-color: #205493; color: #FFFFFF; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button:active, .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button .active, .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button .is-active { background-color: #112E51; border-color: #112E51; color: #FFFFFF; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-links a.button.disabled { background-color: #D6D7D9; border-color: #D6D7D9; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link { margin-bottom: 1.75rem; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a { width: 90%; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a.mobile, .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a.always-display { display: inline-block; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a.desktop { display: none; }

.meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-image-wrapper img { width: 85%; margin-bottom: 4.0625rem; }

@media screen and (min-width: 0) and (max-width: 319px) { .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a { width: 100%; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 575px) { .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a { width: 90%; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 576px) and (max-width: 991px) { .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a { width: 50%; } }

@media (min-width: 576px) { .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-image-wrapper img { width: 20.125rem; } }

@media (min-width: 992px) { .meet-comptroller-general { background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/meet-comptroller-general-background-desktop.png") no-repeat center; background-size: 100% 100%; padding: 4.0625rem 3.125rem 3.125rem 4.0625rem; }
  .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link:nth-child(1), .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link:nth-child(2) { margin: 1rem .55rem 1.75rem 0; }
  .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a { width: 100%; } }

@media (min-width: 1200px) { .meet-comptroller-general { padding: 4.0625rem 3.125rem 3.125rem 8.125rem; }
  .meet-comptroller-general .description { max-width: 65%; }
  .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link:nth-child(1), .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link:nth-child(2) { margin: 1rem 1.25rem 1.75rem 0; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 1330px) { .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a:nth-child(2) { margin-left: 0; }
  .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a.mobile { display: none; }
  .meet-comptroller-general .meet-comptroller-link a.desktop { display: inline-block; } }
